Company Description
Founded in Zurich, Switzerland, Pitcher is a Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) company offering a suite of products to support corporate sales representatives in their daily activities across a number of industries. Today this market is known as Sales Enablement and has grown rapidly since 2010 with further growth expected in the coming years. Pitcher has customers in over 136 countries with offices in Zurich (HQ), Barcelona, Istanbul, Ankara, New York, Mexico City, Vienna, Boston and Tokyo. The Pitcher solution is used by over 100,000 sales professionals every day.

Due to strong growth we are expanding our engineering teams in Ankara & Istanbul and we are immediately looking for a Front End Engineer.

Job Description
Our Front End Engineer will be getting involved with our Product and Tech departments to provide dedicated UI development and support on key tech projects. We are looking for a Front End Engineer that helps us build our next products.


Requirements
3+ years of experience in developing web-based user interfaces
BSc degree in Computer Science or similar field; or equivalent working or open-source experience.
Experienced in JavaScript development (ES5 & ES6)
Good knowledge of CSS/SCSS
Build pipeline experience
Ability to craft SQL queries and an understanding of databases
Git
Strong debugging and problem solving skills
Good communication skills both written and verbal
Ability to drive and manage your own projects
Ability to understand user psychology and needs, aligning them with product specifications
Ability to collaborate with technical teams and translate business requirements
Ability to communicate in English
A passion for learning and technology

Nice to have:
Experience Frontend frameworks are welcomed benefit e.g. Vue, React, Angular, Knockout
Experience in Vuetify or Semantic UI

We Offer:
Opportunity to impact a successful, growing scale-up and its software used by people worldwide
Work in highly-motivated, international and cross-functional teams that push boundaries
Competitive salary
Annual performance bonus
Flat hierarchy
Unlimited access to Linkedin Learnings
Enjoy yearly company events abroad
Pitcherasmus - Possibility to work from any of our offices worldwide, once a year
Flexible working hours (Mon-Fri: Start between 08.00 - 10.00, end between 17.00-19.00)
Office relocation opportunities after 1 year (New York, Barcelona, Mexico, Zurich, Tokyo)
We are a company that value our co-workers and create an atmosphere of well-being

Company Description

Founded in Zurich, Switzerland, Pitcher is a Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) company offering a suite of products to support corporate sales representatives in their daily activities across a number of industries. Today this market is known as Sales Enablement and has grown rapidly since 2010 with further growth expected in the coming years. Pitcher has customers in over 136 countries with offices in Zurich (HQ), Barcelona, Istanbul, Ankara, New York, Mexico City, Vienna, Boston and Tokyo. The Pitcher solution is used by over 100,000 sales professionals every day.


Due to strong growth we are expanding our engineering teams in Istanbul & Ankara and are immediately looking for a Junior Front End Engineer.

Our Junior Front End Engineer will be getting involved with our Product and Tech departments to provide dedicated UI development and support on key tech projects. We are looking for a Junior Front End Engineer that helps us build our next products.


Requirements

1+ years of experience in developing web-based user interfaces

Good knowledge of JavaScript

Good problem-solving skills and technical acumen

Ability to adapt and thrive in a fast-paced environment
Ability to communicate in English
A passion for learning and technology
 

Nice to have:

Experience Frontend frameworks are welcomed benefit e.g. Vue, React, Angular, Knockout
Experience in Vuetify or Semantic UI
